thread.section_title: GogglesNMore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GogglesNMore | gogglesnmore.com
thread.title: Joseph Cho

author: Joseph Cho
title: Joseph Cho
text:
I'm pretty satisified with the goggle. One thing is that if I pull the goggle away from my eyes about 1/4 - 1/2 inch, then it becomes clear like my glasses. I don't know whether the manufacturor did not consider the distance of the lenzes to my eyes - goggle lenzes are closer to my eyes than my regular glasses.
Except that, I'm very satisfied. The delivery was faster than I had expected. the price was reasonable. I can see very clearly in a swimming pool now. That's the best part.
